title: Textile, ca. 1850
medium:
Medium: cotton (cotton confirmed by microscope)
Technique: printed by roller on plain weave; printing machine had both engraved and relief rollers
dimensions: Warp: 107 cm (42 in.). Weft: (2 pieces seamed together) 121 cm (47 5/8 in.)
description: A statue of Joan of Arc within a wreath of leaves and flowers on a striped background filled with stars.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1850.
ca. 1850. Medium: cotton (cotton confirmed by microscope)
Technique: printed by roller on plain weave; printing machine had both engraved and relief rollers. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-265.
